title: kjlimo
author: kjlimo
content: I can't find anything on the results of this...Can anyone share a link or a response from customer service about whether this was successful or terminated?https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/pos-giant-clover-teams-up-with-strike-to-bring-bitcoins-lightning-network-to-millions-ofhttps://www.reddit.com/r/Bitcoin/comments/13kldx3/any_news_on_jack_mallers_efforts_to_get_lightning/

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: kjlimo on December 10, 2024, 02:23:43 PMI can't find anything on the results of this...Can anyone share a link or a response from customer service about whether this was successful or terminated?I also couldn't find a concrete answer to your question [I think your best bet would be to create a topic on their "forum" instead], but considering the lack of a Lightning app on the "Clover App Market" and the fact that Jack didn't overhype it after the 90-day pilot period ended, it's safe to say that it wasn't successful [unfortunately].
